data.name: Squirm OST
data.detailed_description:
By popular demand, the OST for Squirm is available for FREE!
The music was created by E-Lie and Alex Carpenter.
It contains all your favorite tracks from the game, including some UNUSED songs!


Here is a list of every track included for you folks (In order of appearance in-game):
  • "Workaholic" by Alex Carpenter
  • "Spookileum" by Alex Carpenter
  • "Frozen Tears of Joy" by Alex Carpenter
  • "Calorie Killer" by Alex Carpenter
  • "It's a Castle!" by Alex Carpenter
  • "Breath" by Alex Carpenter
  • "What's up" by Alex Carpenter
  • "Mean Green Flying Machine" by Alex Carpenter
  • "I'm So High Right Now!" by E-Lie
  • "Light the Sky!" by E-Lie
  • "Decision Making" by Alex Carpenter
  • "The Final Chompdown" by Alex Carpenter
  • "Purpose" by E-Lie
  • "Credits" by Alex Carpenter
  • "The Mirror Tower by E-Lie/Alex Carpenter
  • "Unused 1 - Old Spookileum" by Alex Carpenter
  • "Unused 2 - Old Castle" by Alex Carpenter

Enjoy!

data.short_description: By popular demand, the OST for Squirm is available for FREE! Enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: You can't render music!
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: You can't render music!
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound
